name: Ash Vehicle AI
description:
Ash Vehicle AI asset is a easy to use and implement vehicle AI solution for unity game engine  to make arcade racing games. And its customizable.

This package is similar to the  Asset " Ash Vehicle Physics " , which is a vehicle physics package(player controlled) and Ash vehicle AI is based on same vehicle physics for AI. 

Features :

- One wheeler AI , 2 Wheeler AI, 4 Wheeler and more .

-Path following AI System.

-Single Target follow (for car chasing games).

- Very easy to setup, no programming required.

- Fast and stable vehicle physics. 

- Support all versions of Unity, from Unity 2019 to Unity 2020, mobile friendly.

- Full source code included.
